alert.note: Alert for Carter; Greene; Hawkins; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 3:40AM CDT until March 25 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Sullivan County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Washington County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Greene County in east Tennessee... Unicoi County in east Tennessee... Western Carter County in east Tennessee... * Until 530 AM EDT. * At 440 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Surgoinsville to near Newport, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Elizabethton, Erwin, Jonesborough, Banner Hill, Central, Spurgeon and Midway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 54. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 41 and 74. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carter; Greene; Hawkins; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington
